revised_title: Magnetic Susceptibilities of Transition Metal Alloys and Density of States Curves
tldr: The authors studied the magnetic susceptibilities of various transition metal alloys and their corresponding density of states curves. They found that the susceptibility and its temperature dependence for the close-packed hexagonal phase differ from that of the body-centered cubic phase of the same composition. The results provide data that confirm the conclusions about the density of states curves for transition metals made in a previous paper.
